statements: SELECT * FROM user_content WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content_title, content_type FROM user_content WHERE content_type = 'Article';
SELECT content_id, content_title FROM user_content WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, content_title FROM user_content ORDER BY content_title DESC;
SELECT content_id, upload_date FROM user_content WHERE content_type = 'Video' ORDER BY upload_date ASC;
SELECT content_title, content_type, upload_date FROM user_content WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT content_title, content_type, user_id FROM user_content WHERE content_type = 'Video' ORDER BY content_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_content WHERE user_id = 2 AND content_type = 'Image' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT content_title, upload_date FROM user_content WHERE user_id = 3 AND content_type = 'Document' ORDER BY upload_date ASC;
SELECT content_title, content_type FROM user_content WHERE content_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM photos WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT photo_url FROM photos WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT photo_id, upload_date FROM photos ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_content FROM posts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT photo_url, upload_date FROM photos WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT post_content FROM posts WHERE user_id = '98765432-1011-1213-1415-161718192021';
SELECT * FROM photos JOIN posts ON photos.user_id = posts.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_photos FROM photos;
SELECT * FROM Photos WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT photo_url FROM Photos WHERE photo_id = 2;
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM Posts WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Videos WHERE video_id = 4;
SELECT user_id, video_duration FROM Videos WHERE user_id = 2 AND video_duration > 60;
SELECT * FROM Photos ORDER BY photo_id DESC, user_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(photo_id) AS num_photos FROM Photos GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_photos > 5;
SELECT post_date, post_text FROM Posts WHERE post_id = 1 OR post_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, video_url FROM Videos WHERE video_duration > 60 ORDER BY user_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_id, user_id, photo_url FROM Photos JOIN Videos ON Photos.user_id = Videos.user_id WHERE photo_id > 10 AND video_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT photo_url, upload_date FROM Photos WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, content FROM Posts WHERE user_id = 2 AND post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(photo_id) AS total_photos FROM Photos GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM Photos WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, content FROM Posts WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS photo_count FROM Photos GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT Users.username, COUNT(*) AS video_count FROM Videos INNER JOIN Users ON Videos.user_id = Users.user_id GROUP BY Users.username;
SELECT * FROM Videos WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT photo_url, description FROM photos ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT video_url, duration FROM videos WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, username FROM users WHERE created_at <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id FROM likes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT p.photo_url, u.username FROM photos p JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT post_content FROM posts WHERE post_id IN (SELECT post_id FROM likes WHERE user_id = 2);
